reviews.review:
Even though this game can be finished in a short time (took me 4 hours), it's definitely one of the best gaming experiences I've ever hard. Lovers of puzzles and mystery will love this game. 

Pros:
- Great gameplay mechanics
- Mysterious and captivating story
- Tutorials are actually part of the story, not just some extra levels added at the beginning
- Great voice acting (and manipulation), art and attention to detail in objects and level design.
- Difficulty of puzzles never makes you get stuck in one point without knowing what to do. It never interrupts your gaming experience.

Cons:
- Short duration

Highly recommended, even more when it is on sale.
Divertente, accattivante, ironico, sorprendente e mentalmente impegnativo. Nonostante la brevissima durata, uno dei giochi di rompicapo alternativi più riusciti di sempre. Da non perdere.
Si vous avez la tête qui tourne n'hésitez pas à vous évanouir :)
传送门是一款很经典的益智类游戏了，传送门有着很不错的剧情以及各种丧心病狂的关卡。玩传送门需要非常高的智商，尤其是到后面关卡越来越难。刚开始的时候玩了几关传送门根本就停不下来啊，太好玩了。
Que dire... Portal restera surement le meilleur jeu de tous les temps.
Didn't think I'd like this when I bought it, but the girlfriend nagged me into it. Came away blown away. Fantastic game, good storyline. The Cake is a lie.
I want to jump through her portal.

Wow. Everyone should play this game. It is a classic, and for good reasons. The witty humor, puzzling gameplay, and great story, all contribute to a game that has changed the entire industry. The concept is unique, the aesthetics are pleasing, and I can't find anything to complain about. it is definitely worth picking up. I love this game, and I am sure others will too.
Um dos melhore jogos de puzzle que ja joguei.

So much fun. A true classic that will never get old.

8.5/10
i think portal is very well designed game i love just the portals portals PORTALS its zoom through here then zoom out there

Обязательно к употреблению!

Desenvolvido pela Valve.
-----------------------------------História----------------------------------

Em portal, você começa a controlar a protagonista chamada Chell, no qual você acorda em uma sala, e fica ouvindo instruções de um robô, chamado GLADOS. Você não tem como sair do jogo, até porque você é uma pessoa que vai testar suas capacidades, e, com o auxílio de GLADOS, irá participar de salas e salas de puzzles.

--------------------Sobre o jogo e minhas experiências--------------------

Sobre o jogo, na época que foi lançado eu mal tinha a oportunidade de jogar, porém até hoje(2014) é um jogo muuuito inovador e criativo. Pensa só... onde mais você viu um jogo que você atravessa paredes com uma arma que faz portais?
Muito inteligente! A valve sempre se superando. É isso o que eu acho do game. Surpreendente!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Minha Nota: 10/10
Nota da MetaScore: 9/10

OBS: Existe Portal 2 também, que é outro jogão!

Portal est jeu de réflexion à la première personne, très original créé par Valve. Malgré une durée de vie assez courte, ce jeu propose un gameplay unique avec un humour [strike] noir[/strike] omniprésent. 

Avec une intrigue prenante, ce sera donc peu d’heures de jeu mais de bonnes heures de jeu.[spoiler] Je vous laisse une part du « gâteau ».[/spoiler]

This game has tons of puzzles and even more with the workshop. Lots of lore added after a long time after release to keep people happy about next release and tie ins to other games but i would recommend it because apparently people like this robot talking so i would recommend it because of that and the ending song which is probably the best part of this game. Part 2 has co op which adds a lot more gameplay fun, which would have made this game a whole lot more fun.

"I thought I could trust 'her', whoever she is that people keep talking about... Until I eventually [i]did[/i] meet her. I didn't care about what she called me, what lies she was making up. False promises of a non-existent Cake? Making me think I was adopted? Didn't care about those, either. A schizophrenic former-employee to guide me in the future making nonsensical scribblings on the wall, but what do I care? I just want to solve these tests and get out as quickly as possible."

~Chell's Mind, my point of view.

This game is wit and charm mixed with great amounts of brainjuice and pure love. It is stirred together and poured all over a wonderful puzzle mechanic, covering it all with intense flavors of delicious as you make your way through them.
It is not a mere game, despite it being -just- a puzzle. It's a piece of comedic solid gold; so solid that it form the black holes inside the portal guns.s

Different to any other game I've ever played. Makes you think but remains a free flowing game, guiding you through learning the skills you need to finish the game in a way that doesn't get annoying even on repeat plays. The 'evil' computer is nearly hypnotic and the humour in the game really sets the tone for a light, enjoyable game.

A true classic belonging in everyone's collection.

Chances are you've heard of Portal. You've heard that it's an innovative puzzle game filled with quirky humor and promises of cake. You might've even heard that the game is fun to play. All these things are true, unless you're some sort of Bizarro type figure, than you might say that the game is not innovative, has no humor and doesn't promise cake. In Bizarro terms, this game sucks.

Впечатлающая игра. Графика хоть и не на высшем уровне, но модели, звуковое оформление и высококачественные текстуры просто восхитительны. Главное, что игра совсем не теряет FPS. Хочется снова и снова включить игру и пойти в самую большую комнату и вытворять эпические трюки. Теперь пойду проходить продолжение сюжета во второй части игры.

During the last steam summer sale, I decided to purchase both this game and its sequal. I just finished this game, and I was not disapointed. The puzzles were challenging, and the comentary of Glados made me laugh. If you are on the fence about this game, do not hesitate to buy it because you will not be dasapointed.
To quote Ben "Yahtzee" Croshaw, "the most fun you'll have with your PC until they invent a force-feedback codpiece".

[h1]Introduction:[/h1] A completely original and innovative game!

If you have a passion for sci-fi, and enjoy solving puzzles, this first person experience is exactly what you're looking for! Portal takes place at the heart of the Aperture Enrichment Center, where the test subject is united with her trusty companion cube and Handheld Portal Device in the name of science. There are 19 test chambers altogether.

[h1]Story:[/h1] While the story itself might be a bit bare, there is plenty food for thought, and suggestive twisted backstory regarding Aperture. It all begins in the Relaxation Vault, where the test subject first comes into contact with the Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System (further referred to as GLaDOS), and is then educated on how to use the portal gun. With GLaDOS as your guide, what could possibly go wrong? After all, nobody else is as familiar with the Aperture Laboratories as the artificial intelligence that oversees seemingly all of Aperture's scientific experiments. Much of the story is best left unsaid, so I put the rest in spoiler tags.

[spoiler]It isn't long before the character will stumble over various forms of warnings, from an unseen individual, warning her about the facility... More importantly, her guide. With this in mind, the character dynamics shift, and her task becomes clear: She must escape a laboratory otherwise devoid of human life.[/spoiler]

[h1]Gameplay:[/h1] Covering the basics: A complete portal consists of both an exit and entrance. Throughout the game, the character will acquire two extremely important pieces of equipment, which will enable her to create a complete portal. Initially, she will not be able to make a portal by herself, which forces her to rely on various forms of equipment littering the early chambers of the facility on her journey to the first gun. Only when the blue gun is acquired, can she unlock the ability to make half of the portal for herself. Soon after, she will be in possession of both portals, which is where the real fun begins.

With both halves of the portal, the options become endless. The character could essentially jump or fall forever. Regardless, the game offers a lot of content for beginners and advanced players alike. Regardless, the game is highly addictive, and will leave the player with a desire for more. If this is your first puzzle game, don't give up! Once you get the hang of the game mechanics, clearing the game will be a cinch. I promise. 

The theme provides a perfect balance between creepy and mysterious, leaving the player in suspense. Yet, the best feature is easily the dialogue of GLaDOS which sporadically plays through the game. 

I think my only complaint is that the game is so short, but not to worry, there's a sequel. =)

[h1]Controls:[/h1] I found the controls to be a little bit tricky at first, but they were something that grew on me with a bit of practice. The game is compatible with the XBOX 360 controller, if you have it installed to your computer, however I stand by my initial statement: Default controls are a bit tricky, but something that the player will easily pick up with a little bit of patience. I can't really complain too much about the controls in Portal.

[h1]Graphics:[/h1] Aesthetically, Portal felt a little bland to me, but the overall effect fits its story perfectly. Sleek, and defined, the visual appearance does its job. On a very rare occasion, you might run into small graphics glitches, but it is nothing to worry about.

[h1]Sound:[/h1] I, for one, really freaking love the voice of GLAdOS. The amount of humour that she presents to the game is astonishing on its own, and really distracted me from being able to give a solid opinion about the otherwise subtle sounds of Portal. 

[h1]Replay Value:[/h1] Definitely a game that can be played multiple times! Portal is genius, and if you don't love GLaDOS (or Portal) within a few hours, I myself will question your humanity... Not to mention there will be no cake for you!

One of my all time favorite games. A first-person puzzle shooter that will challenge you to think differently. It also has some of the funniest writing in any game I've played.
Думаю не стоит заикаться, как охренительна эта игра. Да. Не знаю даже зачем пишу этот "обзор". Короче, мастхэв игра для всех! Минус лишь один -- короткая она, но очень увлекательна.

Не являясь ни разу поклонником жанра 1st Person Action должен заметить, что Portal вызывает массу положительных эмоций. Необычная головоломка, с незатейливым сюжетом и неплохим юмором. Конечно, как полноценная игра Портал смотрится не так эффектно (изначально он входил в The Orange Box) и демонстрирует ряд признаков модификации, нежели самостоятельного проекта. 
Игра кажется короткой, чувствует недостаток расширений после прохождения кампании, но превосходный геймплей, тортик и великолепная песня в титрах заставляет забыть об этих недостатках. Прекрасная игра!
8/10
funny game love when the cp talks!!!
10/10 Would teleport again

Capostipite di una tipologia di puzzle-platform veramente GENIALE.

Dal punto di vista tecnico è un gioco che sente il peso degli anni, ma l'intera componente grafica passa totalmente in secondo piano quando ci si trova davanti al design dei livelli, puliti, asettici e di una semplicità disarmante, semplicità che la si ritrova anche nel gameplay, semplice e intuitivo.

Tutt'altro che semplice invece sono gli enigmi, che più di una volta ci faranno spremere le meningi riuscire ad andare avanti.

Letteralmente spettacolare è l'umorismo di cui è pieno zeppo il titolo, forse il più geniale che abbia mai incontrato e con un finale e i conseguenti titoli di coda, che ci terranno attaccati allo schermo per leggere ogni singola frase detta (non è doppiato in italiano ma solo sottotitolato).

Unica pecca è la longevità che è veramente bassa, si parla di circa 3 ore o meno per finire la modalità storia, successivamente ci si potrà cimentare nelle sfide che potranno tenere impegnati per altre ore.

In definitiva un acquisto obbligato per tutti gli amanti dei puzzle, visto soprattutto il prezzo irrisorio a cui è venduto.
Классная, но очень быстрая игра, прошел не заметив этого.
